summary: This near-silent black and white film from Argentina tells the story of a city that has lost its voice, stolen by Mr. TV, and the attempts of a small family to win the voice back. Similar in design to early German expressionist films.
cast: Valeria Bertuccelli|Alejandro Urdapilleta|Julieta Cardinali|Rafael Ferro|Florencia Raggi|Sol Moreno|Jonathan Sandor|Raúl Hochman|Ricardo Merkin|Carlos Piñeyro|Camila Offerman|Alejandro Regueiro|Christian Amat|Federico Miri|Paulina Sapir|Silvia Okeksilein|Vicenzo Mazzei|José Manuel Diaz|Fabián Diaz|Gaston Pratt|Diana Szeinblum|León Dogodny|Daiana Cincunegui|Leticia Mazur|Griselda Siciliani|Gustavo Pastorini
title: La antena
